sentences.english: This mountain is about two thousand meters high.
The whole length of book shelves is 275 km.
This street is 1,000 meters in its total length, and it has a history of 1,410 years.
sentences.chinese: 该街总长有一千米，有一千四百一十年的历史。

sentences.english: Forgive me for mixing up meters with kilometers, but you have to convert that, of course, to meters.
sentences.chinese: 原谅我弄混，米和千米，但你们当然得，转换成米。

sentences.english: Then he and his wife entered a five-kilometer race. “We survived, ” said Dr. Smith, who is 54.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他和他的妻子参加了5千米的比赛。

sentences.english: One breeding female tiger had a home range of about 15 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 一只繁殖的雌虎大约拥有15平方千米的家域范围。

sentences.english: There is no restriction on the number of participants from each organisation.
sentences.chinese: 全程约九千米，参加者年龄不限。

sentences.english: It starts nearly two kilometers under Blue Lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 蓝湖温泉的水来自湖底大约两千米的地方。

sentences.english: The snow line here has risen 150 meters, and glaciers have retreated by 10 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 雪线升高了150米，冰川也因此消退了10千米。

sentences.english: Mississippi sword-boat, ranked fourth world 6262 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比全长6262千米，名列世界第四。

sentences.english: It is over twenty-five kilometers high and the largest known volcano in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 它高25千米多，是太阳系中所知道的最大的火山。

sentences.english: The distance light travels in one second is 300,000 kilometers or thereabout .
sentences.chinese: 光在一秒钟内传播的距离大约为30万千米。

sentences.english: Its epicentre was about 130km off Japan's east coast.
sentences.chinese: 地震震中距离日本东部海岸大约130千米。

sentences.english: The IP method can probe to subsurface depths of thousands of meters.
sentences.chinese: 激发极化法的探测深度可达数千米深。

sentences.english: The kilometer is the biggest unit of length in the metric system.
sentences.chinese: 千米是国际公制中最长的长度单元。

sentences.english: Wang Lei ran faster than any other boy and got the first place in the boys' 1,000 meters.
sentences.chinese: 王磊比其男孩跑得快而且得到了男子一千米的冠军。

definition: mile (unit of length equal to 1.609 km)
at a distance of/distance/to be apart
distance apart/separated by a given distance
foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
